triplets: Domesticated mammal raised for meat, leather, and other products
Pork production, leather, medical research, and as pets in some cases
Snout, hooves, tail, ears, and thick body with fat layers
Pink, black, spotted, or brown depending on breed
Livestock farming, agriculture, and food supply chains
Not manufactured; bred on farms and raised for agriculture
Approximately 1–2 meters from snout to tail
6–10 years in captivity; slaughtered earlier for meat
